title: Over a period of almost 5000 years, Allah sent 25 prophets, of which only the 25th prophet successfully spread Islam/Allah's message. It took Allah, an omniscient and omnipotent being, 25 attempts to spread his message. A track-record like this would get you fired from McDonald's.
